The most advanced LinkedIn automation software that automates visiting, connecting, messaging and free InMail messaging.  We support you with individual personal customer service.  Call us and we will answer the phone to help.
 
Automate Network Building
With just a few clicks, Inchworm automates your LinkedIn marketing and network building by visiting public profiles that you select. This, in turn, increases visits to your profile, allowing you to easily make more new connections. The details of these public profiles can then be exported and viewed in a CSV file.
 
Increase Profile Visits
Inchworm helps you build a strong network by automating the LinkedIn connection process. The simple act of visiting relevant profiles drives visits to your profile, organically increasing brand awareness and connections. More than 40% of LinkedIn users check their recent visitors and will view the profile of their visitors. If your business is relevant, they are likely to send you a connection request.
 
Send Personalized LinkedIn Automated Connection Requests
Our Connection module can send LinkedIn automated connection requests using our highly customizable templates. Personalize each request with name, title, and company. The software tracks the requests reporting duplicate requests, failed requests, and successful requests sent. Send up to 50 connection requests per day.
 
Send LinkedIn Automated Personalized Messages
Our Message module can send automated LinkedIn messages using our highly customizable templates. Personalize each message with name, title, and company. Send up to 50 messages per day.
 
Send Free LinkedIn InMails
Our Message module can send LinkedIn automated InMails using our highly customizable templates. Personalize each InMail with name, title, and company. Send up to 800 InMails per month. Free InMails can be sent to all Premium users with an Open profile. 39% of LinkedIn users are premium customers.
 
Create a Custom Database
Our platform delivers data directly into your workflow allowing you to create a custom database. Whether youâ€™re focused on verifying new partners, capitalizing on your LinkedIn contacts, or reviving an old contact list this information can transform the way you sell.
 
Inchworm has received rave reviews from customers who have used it to grow their network, automate their LinkedIn lead generation, and simplify their social selling process.
While Inchworm shares similarities with Linked Helper, Octopus, Dux Soup, Prospectin, and Meet Leonard, it stands out for its safety features. By simulating manual work and incorporating random delays after each action, Inchworm ensures the safety of its users. Additionally, Inchworm offers an extensive range of features, making it a versatile and powerful tool for LinkedIn lead generation, social selling, and auto-connect activities.
 
Try Inchworm today and experience the power of an all-in-one LinkedIn marketing software.  Please don't forget to rate us if you love the software.
